savedData.paragraph: Two friends, Anna and Mark, sit in a park. Anna says, “I love dogs! What type do you like?” Mark replies, “I like big dogs, like German Shepherds. They are strong and loyal.” Anna nods, “I prefer small dogs, like Chihuahuas. They are cute and friendly.” They smile and continue chatting.
savedData.translation: Due amici, Anna e Mark, *si siedono in un parco. Anna *dice, “*Amo i cani! Che tipo *ti piace?” Mark *risponde, “*Mi piacciono i cani grandi, come i Pastori Tedeschi. *Sono forti e leali.” Anna *annuisce, “*Preferisco i cani piccoli, come i Chihuahuas. *Sono carini e amichevoli.” *Sorridono e *continuano a chiacchierare.
savedData.title: dogs
